name: ReportManager

methods.name: describeReport
methods.description: Retrieves report, report type, and extended metadata for a tabular, summary, or matrix report.

methods.name: getDatatypeFilterOperatorMap
methods.description: Lists the field data types that you can use to filter the report.

methods.name: getReportInstance
methods.description: Retrieves results for an instance of a report that has been run asynchronously. The settings you use when you run your asynchronous report determine whether you can retrieve summary data or detailed data.

methods.name: getReportInstances
methods.description: Returns a list of instances for a report that was run asynchronously. Each item in the list represents a separate instance of the report, with metadata for the time at which the report was run.

methods.name: runAsyncReport
methods.description: Runs a report asynchronously with the report ID. Includes details if includeDetails is set to true. Filters the report based on the report metadata in reportMetadata.

methods.name: runAsyncReport
methods.description: Runs a report asynchronously with the report ID. Includes details if includeDetails is set to true.

methods.name: runAsyncReport
methods.description: Runs a report asynchronously with the report ID. Filters the results based on the report metadata in reportMetadata.

methods.name: runAsyncReport
methods.description: Runs a report asynchronously with the report ID.

methods.name: runReport
methods.description: Runs a report immediately with the report ID. Includes details if includeDetails is set to true. Filters the results based on the report metadata in reportMetadata.

methods.name: runReport
methods.description: Runs a report immediately with the report ID. Includes details if includeDetails is set to true.

methods.name: runReport
methods.description: Runs a report immediately with the report ID. Filters the results based on the report metadata in rmData.

methods.name: runReport
methods.description: Runs a report immediately with the report ID.

description: Runs a report synchronously or asynchronously and with or without details.
